amendment.description: To express the sense of them Senate concerning the structure of Medicare reform and the prescription drug benefit to ensure Medicare's long-term solvency and high quality of care.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1121 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1121 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Kyl. (consideration: CR S8681-8684; text: CR S8683-8684) To express the sense of them Senate concerning the structure of Medicare reform and the prescription drug benefit to ensure Medicare's long-term solvency and high quality of care.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1121 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1121 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Kyl.
